articles.title: What Christian Gonzalez said about his head injury
articles.description:
Gonzalez left the game in the fourth quarter, but later said that he was fine.

The post What Christian Gonzalez said about his head injury appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Christian Gonzalez left the game due to a head injury in the fourth quarter.
Gonzalez reassured fans he was fine after the incident on November 2, 2025.
His health status is crucial for the Patriots' upcoming games and local fan morale.
